scenes.background: You agree to prioritize the presentation. [Monica] prepares her notes.
scenes.description: [Monica] says, 'I think we should include the latest market trends. Do you have time to look that up?'

options.text: I'll see what I can find quickly, but let's keep our main focus on the presentation.
options.analysis: You demonstrate a balanced approach, showing social skills and self-regulation, but your motivation to dive deep into the task seems limited.

options.text: Sure, I'll gather some data right away. It might take some time, though.
options.analysis: You show high social skills and emotional perception, but might overextend yourself, affecting your empathy and self-regulation.

options.text: Can we skip the trends for now? We need to polish the slides first.
options.analysis: You exhibit strong self-regulation and a focus on the immediate task, but your emotional perception and empathy might be viewed as lower.
